jobDescription: OVERVIEWThe Implementation Project Manager is an integral part of our Operations team. You ensure that all clients’ 401k plans go through a seamless implementation onto our platform and coordinate the proper resources to ensure our clients receive the best possible experience. Organization and detail are a top priority for you; you are a perfectionist at heart and love to define, document, and scale processes that drive day to day client success.TEAMOur Operations team is a group of detail oriented CoCreators collaborating to find solutions for the complex compliance issues surrounding 401k plans. They strive for 100% accuracy when analyzing our client’s data and lean on the team’s collective knowledge to improve and automate as our business grows. We rely on our Operations team to create an awesome client experience with the move to a new system that could otherwise be stressful. Our mission to fix retirement in America drives each team member and makes every incremental improvement exciting and meaningful.CAREER PROGRESSIONForUsAll is not only a business, but a company full of opportunities. We firmly believe in taking care of our own by providing CoCreators with the necessary skills and resources to grow professionally as well as personally. From this position you could continue upward as a leader on the Operations team or transition to a more client facing role on our Client Advisory team.DAY TO DAY
